trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个对象，指定的数据行的布局。

trans-unit.source: The GridViewRowPresenter and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: GridViewRowPresenter 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>类支持<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>视图模式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"></xref> class.
Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 定位根据大小的行的相应内容<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that is used to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要显示在行的数据内容。

trans-unit.source: The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.
trans-unit.target: 典型用法<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>中[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]是在其中放置该<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>的控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: The template binds the Content property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 模板中将内容属性绑定到控件的属性，通过使用[TemplateBinding 标记扩展](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to bind the Content property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将绑定的内容属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle#ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)] ## XAML Text Usage See Remarks.
trans-unit.target: [!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml)][!code-xml[ListViewItemStyle #ControlTemplate](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/p-system.windows.control_264_1.xaml) ] # # XAML 文本用法，请参阅备注。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`||

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the content of a row.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
To be added.
Determines the area that is required to display the row.
trans-unit.target: 确定所显示的行所需的区域。

trans-unit.source: The maximum area to use to display the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area that displays the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
Returns a string representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
A string that shows the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content*>.
